document_data.mainbody:
elmath was an acquaintance of several guards in Shadowdale in the mid-14 century DR.
While being spied by Malark Himbruel in the , one guard related unto the others that hed witnessed the spellfire wielded by Shandril Shessair. While describing her exertion, he compared her face to the one that Delmath himself made while lifting a heavy barrel.
